text: I really enjoyed this game but wish the story had been a little darker towards the end. While I was playing it I had imagined that the Professor was frantically trying to repair his machine for years to try to bring the other characters back, oblivious to the fact that he was trapped in Evermore as well.

author: WhiteTigerShiro

text: The more I replay this game and the more time passes, the more I like it. It's probably now my 5th favorite RPG on the SNES behind CT, Earthbound, FF6 and Secret of Mana. The atmosphere it creates however is my favorite, only rivaled by Super Metroid on the console. Jeremy Soule played a major part in creating such a unique atmosphere with his mix of melodies, reverb and ambient sounds.
author: SupraDarky
